Package org.sgrewritten.stargate.api.gate

Class ExplicitGateBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.sgrewritten.stargate.api.gate.ExplicitGateBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
GateBuilder
public class ExplicitGateBuilder extends Object implements GateBuilder
Builder for gate objects based on already known parameters. To build a gate from unknown parameters, use ImplicitGateBuilder
